EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, your #SOI2013 research webinar reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us on September 26 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The Future of Work: Self-Employed Workers Are Americaâ€™s Hidden Growth Engine <http://info.mbopartners.com/26Sept13SOI_RegistrationPage.html>."
In this hour-long webinar, MBO Partners' CEO Gene Zaino will discuss the latest research on the self-employed workforce, from demographics to economic influence, with Steve King and Carolyn Ockels, Partners at Emergent Research. There will be plenty of time in the presentation for any questions you may have about this group that was not outlined in the full report. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/26Sept13SOI_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
